NAME: Richa Sethia, CFA
ABOUT:
My work experience ranges from Alcobev, Oil & Gas to FMCG. Currently, I am in charge of product pricing for India at United Spirits Limited (Diageo Group Company). Previously, I have worked with one of the world's largest Oil & Gas majors, Royal Dutch Shell where I gained experience in business planning, pricing support and business performance management. I have also worked with India's leading FMCG company ITC Limited, where I played a key role in financial and strategic planning, cost control, new business feasibility study, marketing spend and inventory control.
I have earned my PGP degree from the Indian School of Business with majors in Finance & Strategy (2015 batch), CFA Charterholder from CFA Institute, and graduated in BBA (Finance) from St. Xavier's College, Kolkata.
